name: TEAM T.G.A
description:
TEAM T.G.A is a stealth-based game with a special twist, you play as the whole team.

You´ve been contracted by an anonymous client to infiltrate the mansion and retrieve a suitcase located in a secure place.

Every team member has special abilities that will help you to complete the mission.

  • The Diver - Swimming, diving and even climbing!
  • The Guard - Invisible to security.
  • The Hacker - H4ck1ng.

This game was created within one week as a part of the Brackeys game jam, with the theme being stronger together

Music: Stealth Music - Ninja by Avery Alexander
